metadata.title: CVE-2017-13756 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.4.2, opening a crafted disk image triggers infinite recursion in dos_load_ext_table() in tsk/vs/dos.c in libtskvs.a, as demonstrated by mmls.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-3').
